Pre-Game Insights: Denmark are marginal favourites at 11/8 to win the match against Switzerland.
Switzerland are priced at 19/10 to cause an upset against Denmark.
The odds for a draw between Denmark and Switzerland are 21/10.
Granit Xhaka to register a shot on target has been boosted to 3/1 odds.
Christian Eriksen to win 2+ fouls has been boosted to 4/1 odds.
Jonas Wind and Breel Embolo both to score has been boosted to 18/1 odds.
There is a price boost for 10+ match shots on target at 3/1 odds.
